00071 void MainWindow::changeEvent(QEvent *e)
00072 {
00073     QMainWindow::changeEvent(e);
00074     switch (e->type()) {
00075     case QEvent::LanguageChange:
00076         ui->retranslateUi(this);
00077         break;
00078     default:
00079         break;
00080     }
00081 }

00088 bool MainWindow::eventFilter(QObject *obj, QEvent *event)
00089 {
00090     QString floor,num,cap;
00091     vector<Room> Room;
00092     Room = RM.fetchAllRooms();
00093     int RoomSize=Room.size();
00094 
00095     if (event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonDblClick)
00096     {
00097         ui->RoomNumberReservation->setText(obj->objectName());
00098         return true;
00099     }
00100     else if (event->type() == QEvent::MouseButtonRelease)
00101     {
00102         ui->PopNum->setText(obj->objectName());
00103         num.setNum(obj->objectName().toInt());
00104         for(int i=0;i<RoomSize;i++)
00105             if(Room[i].getRoomNumber()==num.toInt())
00106             {
00107                 floor.setNum(Room[i].getRoomFloor());
00108                 cap.setNum(Room[i].getCapacity());
00109             }
00110         ui->PopFloor->setText(floor);
00111         ui->PopCap->setText(cap);
00112         return true;
00113     }
00114     else
00115     {
00116         // standard event processing
00117         return QObject::eventFilter(obj, event);
00118     }
00119 }

00121 void MainWindow::CustomerTableView()
00122 {
00123     int i;
00124     vector<Customer> Customers;
00125     Customers = CM.fetchAllCustomers();
00126     ui->CustomerTable->setRowCount(Customers.size());
00127 
00128     for (i=0;i<(int)Customers.size();i++)
00129     {
00130         ui->CustomerTable->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem(Customers[i].getId()));
00131         ui->CustomerTable->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem(Customers[i].getName()));
00132         ui->CustomerTable->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem(Customers[i].getSurname()));
00133         ui->CustomerTable->setItem(i,3,new QTableWidgetItem(QString("%1").arg(Customers[i].getGroupId())));
00134     }
00135 }

00253 void MainWindow::on_NewReservation_clicked()
00254 {
00255     if("" == ui->CustomerIdReservation->text() || "" == ui->RoomNumberReservation->text())
00256     {
00257         QMessageBox::about(0,Title,EmptyRes);
00258         ui->CustomerIdReservation->setFocus();
00259     }
00260     else
00261     {
00262         if(ui->CheckInDate->date() < QDate::currentDate())
00263         {
00264             QMessageBox::about(0,Title,DateBeforeCurrentDate);
00265             ui->CheckInDate->setDate(QDate(QDate::currentDate()));
00266         }
00267         else if(ui->CheckOutDate->date() < ui->CheckInDate->date())
00268         {
00269             QMessageBox::about(0,Title,CheckOutBeforeCheckIn);
00270             ui->CheckOutDate->setDate(ui->CheckInDate->date());
00271         }
00272         else
00273         {
00274             Room room;
00275             Customer customer;
00276 
00277             customer.setId(ui->CustomerIdReservation->text());
00278             room.setRoomNumber(ui->RoomNumberReservation->text().toInt());
00279 
00280             ResM.roomReservation(ui->CheckInDate->date(),ui->CheckOutDate->date(),room,customer);
00281 
00282             ui->CheckInDate->setDate(QDate(QDate::currentDate()));
00283             ui->CheckOutDate->setDate(QDate(QDate::currentDate()));
00284             ui->CustomerIdReservation->setText("");
00285             ui->RoomNumberReservation->setText("");
00286             ui->CustomerIdReservation->setFocus();
00287             showRoomGrid();
00288         }
00289     }
00290 }

00292 void MainWindow::on_InsertCustomer_clicked()
00293 {
00294     if("" == ui->CustomerID->text() || "" == ui->CustomerName->text() || "" == ui->CustomerSurname->text() || "" == ui->CustomerGroupId->text())
00295     {
00296         QMessageBox::about(0,Title,NotAllCustomerData);
00297         ui->CustomerID->setFocus();
00298     }
00299     else
00300     {
00301         Customer customer;
00302 
00303         customer.setId( ui->CustomerID->text() );
00304         customer.setName( ui->CustomerName->text());
00305         customer.setSurname( ui->CustomerSurname->text());
00306         customer.setGroupId( ui->CustomerGroupId->text().toInt());
00307 
00308         CM.newCustomer(customer);
00309 
00310         ui->CustomerName->setText("");
00311         ui->CustomerSurname->setText("");
00312         ui->CustomerID->setText("");
00313         ui->CustomerGroupId->setText("");
00314         ui->CustomerID->setFocus();
00315         CustomerTableView();
00316     }
00317 }

00340 void MainWindow::on_FindCustomer_clicked()
00341 {
00342     if("" == ui->FindID->text())
00343     {
00344         QMessageBox::about(0,Title,NoCustomerID);
00345         ui->FindID->setFocus();
00346     }
00347     else
00348     {
00349         Customer customer;
00350 
00351         customer = CM.fetchCustomer(ui->FindID->text());
00352         if(customer.getName()!="")
00353         {
00354             ui->FindName->setText(customer.getName());
00355             ui->FindSurname->setText(customer.getSurname());
00356             ui->FindGroupID->setText(QString("%1").arg(customer.getGroupId()));
00357          }
00358         else
00359         {
00360           QMessageBox::about(0,Title,NoCustomerID);
00361         }
00362         ui->FindName->setFocus();
00363     }
00364 
00365 }

00439 void MainWindow::on_pushButton_clicked()

00452         {

00489 void MainWindow::showRoomGrid()
00490 {
00491     if(0!=Grid || 0!=scroll || 0!=layout)
00492     {
00493         delete Grid;
00494         delete scroll;
00495         delete layout;
00496     }
00497     layout = new QVBoxLayout();
00498     scroll = new QScrollArea(this);
00499     Grid = new QGridLayout(this);
00500 
00501     Grid->setHorizontalSpacing(6);
00502     Grid->setVerticalSpacing(6);
00503     scroll->setLayout(Grid);
00504     layout->addWidget(scroll);
00505 
00506     ui->Tabs2->widget(0)->setLayout(layout);
00507     vector<Room> Room;
00508     QString RoomNumTitle,RoomFloor;
00509 
00510     Room = RM.fetchAllRooms();
00511 
00512     int RoomSize=Room.size();
00513     int i=0,j=0;
00514     int num=0,RoomNum=0;
00515 
00516     while(num!=RoomSize)
00517     {
00518         QLabel * RoomLabel = new QLabel(this);
00519         RoomLabel->setGeometry(0,0,310,180);
00520         RoomLabel->setFrameShape(QFrame::Box);
00521         RoomLabel->setFrameShadow(QFrame::Sunken);
00522         RoomLabel->setAlignment(Qt::AlignHCenter|Qt::AlignVCenter);
00523         RoomLabel->setFont(QFont( "Comic Sans MS", 8, QFont::Bold ));
00524         //-----------------------------------------------------------
00525         RoomNumTitle.setNum(Room[RoomNum].getRoomNumber());
00526         RoomFloor.setNum(Room[RoomNum].getRoomFloor());
00527         RoomLabel->setObjectName(RoomNumTitle);
00528         RoomLabel->setText("Num:"+RoomNumTitle+"\n Floor:"+RoomFloor);
00529         //-----------------------------------------------------------
00530         if(RM.getStatus(Room[RoomNum].getRoomNumber(),QDate::currentDate(),QDate::currentDate())==false)
00531             RoomLabel->setStyleSheet("color: white; background-color:green;");
00532         else
00533             RoomLabel->setStyleSheet("color: white; background-color:red;");
00534         //-----------------------------------------------------------
00535         RoomLabel->installEventFilter(this);
00536         Grid->addWidget(RoomLabel,i,j);
00537         num++;
00538         if(j<5)
00539         {
00540             j++;
00541         }
00542         else
00543         {
00544             j=0;
00545             i++;
00546         }
00547         RoomNum++;
00548     }
00549 }

00564 void MainWindow::on_InstantEdit_textChanged(QString )
00565 {
00566     int i;
00567 
00568     if(ui->InstantEdit->text()!="")
00569     {
00570         vector<Customer> searchCustomers;
00571 
00572         searchCustomers = CM.searchCustomerByValue(ui->InstantEdit->text());
00573 
00574         ui->InstantTableView->setRowCount(searchCustomers.size());
00575         ui->InstantTableView->setColumnCount(4);
00576         ui->InstantTableView->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(QStringList() << tr("ID")
00577                                                                       << tr("Name")
00578                                                                       << tr("SurName")
00579                                                                       << tr("Group ID"));
00580 
00581         for (i=0;i<(int)searchCustomers.size();i++)
00582         {
00583             ui->InstantTableView->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem(searchCustomers[i].getId()));
00584             ui->InstantTableView->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem(searchCustomers[i].getName()));
00585             ui->InstantTableView->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem(searchCustomers[i].getSurname()));
00586             ui->InstantTableView->setItem(i,3,new QTableWidgetItem(QString("%1").arg(searchCustomers[i].getGroupId())));
00587         }
00588     }
00589     else
00590     {
00591         ui->InstantTableView->setRowCount(0);
00592         ui->InstantTableView->setColumnCount(4);
00593         ui->InstantTableView->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(QStringList() << tr("ID")
00594                                                                       << tr("Name")
00595                                                                       << tr("SurName")
00596                                                                       << tr("Group ID"));
00597     }
00598 }

00612 void MainWindow::on_CreateMassiveRoomTable_clicked()

00615     {
00616         ui->MassiveRoomTable->setColumnCount(4);
00617         ui->MassiveRoomTable->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(QStringList() << tr("Room Number")

00620                                                                << tr("Extras"));

00630 
00631 void MainWindow::on_CreateMassiveRoom_clicked()
00632 {
00633     double flag=0;
00634     int i,j;
00635 
00636     for(i = 0; i < ui-> MassiveRoomTableNum->text().toInt(); i++)
00637     {
00638         for(j = 0; j < 3; j++)
00639         {
00640           QTableWidgetItem *item = ui->MassiveRoomTable->item (i, j);
00641           if (0 == item)
00642             flag = 1;
00643         }
00644     }
00645 
00646     if(0==flag)
00647     {
00648         for(i=0;i<(int)ui->MassiveRoomTableNum->text().toInt();i++)
00649         {
00650             Room room;
00651             room.setCapacity(ui->MassiveRoomTable->item(i,2)->text().toInt());
00652             room.setRoomFloor(ui->MassiveRoomTable->item(i,1)->text().toInt());
00653             room.setRoomNumber(ui->MassiveRoomTable->item(i,0)->text().toInt());
00654             RM.newRoom(room);
00655         }
00656         showRoomGrid();
00657         RoomTableView();
00658         QMessageBox::about(0,Title,"Changes saved!!");
00659         ui->MassiveRoomTable->setColumnCount(0);
00660         ui->MassiveRoomTable->setRowCount(0);
00661         ui->CreateMassiveRoom->setEnabled(false);
00662     }
00663     else
00664     {
00665        QMessageBox::about(0,Title,NotAllCustomerData);
00666     }
00667 }

00669 void MainWindow::on_CheckOut_clicked()
00670 {
00671     double ch;
00672     ch = ResM.roomCheckout(ui->CheckOutNum->text().toInt());
00673     if(-1 != ch)
00674     {
00675         ui->CheckOutNum->setText("");
00676         QMessageBox::about(0,Title,QString("%1").arg(ch));
00677         showRoomGrid();
00678     }
00679 }

00681 void MainWindow::on_RefreshRoom_clicked()
00682 {
00683     int i;
00684     vector<Room> Room;
00685     Room = RM.fetchAllRooms();
00686 
00687     ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->setColumnCount(4);
00688     ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(QStringList() << tr("Room Number")
00689                                                            << tr("Room Floor")
00690                                                            << tr("Capacity")
00691                                                            << tr("Extras"));
00692 
00693     ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->setRowCount(Room.size());
00694 
00695     for (i=0;i<(int)Room.size();i++)
00696     {
00697         ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomNumber()) ));
00698         ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomFloor()) ));
00699         ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getCapacity()) ));
00700     }
00701 }

00703 void MainWindow::on_MassiveRoomEditSave_clicked()
00704 {
00705     int i;
00706 
00707     for(i=0;i<ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->rowCount();i++)
00708     {
00709         Room room;
00710         room.setCapacity(ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->item(i,2)->text().toInt());
00711         room.setRoomFloor(ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->item(i,1)->text().toInt());
00712         room.setRoomNumber(ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->item(i,0)->text().toInt());
00713         RM.editRoom(room);
00714     }
00715     showRoomGrid();
00716     RoomTableView();
00717     QMessageBox::about(0,Title,"Changes saved!!");
00718     ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->setColumnCount(0);
00719     ui->MassiveRoomEditTable->setRowCount(0);
00720 }

00776 void MainWindow::on_FindNewPrice_clicked()
00777 {
00778     QMap<int, double> charges;
00779     charges = PM.fetchAllCharges();
00780     if(charges.contains(ui->EditCap->text().toInt()))
00781     {
00782         ui->EditPrice->setText(QString("%1").arg(charges[ui->EditCap->text().toInt()]));
00783     }
00784 }

00790 }
00791 
00792 void MainWindow::PricesTableView()
00793 {
00794     int j = 0;
00795 
00796     QMap<int, double> charges;
00797     charges = PM.fetchAllCharges();
00798     ui->RoomTablePrice->setRowCount(charges.size());
00799     QMapIterator<int, double> i(charges);
00800 
00801     while (i.hasNext())
00802     {
00803         i.next();
00804 
00805         int key = i.key();
00806         double price = i.value();
00807 
00808         ui->RoomTablePrice->setItem(j, 0, new QTableWidgetItem(QString("%1").arg(key)));
00809         ui->RoomTablePrice->setItem(j, 1, new QTableWidgetItem(QString("%1").arg(price)));
00810 
00811         ++j;
00812     }
00813 }

00864 void MainWindow::on_Search_clicked()
00865 {
00866     vector<Room> Room;
00867 
00868     if(ui->comboBox->currentIndex()==0)
00869     {
00870         Room = RM.searchRoomByFloor(ui->SearchRoom->text().toInt());
00871         ui->SearchRoomTableView->setRowCount(Room.size());
00872         for (unsigned int i=0;i<Room.size();i++)
00873         {
00874             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomNumber()) ));
00875             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomFloor()) ));
00876             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getCapacity()) ));
00877         }
00878     }
00879     if(ui->comboBox->currentIndex()==1)
00880     {
00881         Room = RM.searchRoomByCapacity(ui->SearchRoom->text().toInt());
00882         ui->SearchRoomTableView->setRowCount(Room.size());
00883         for (unsigned int i=0;i<Room.size();i++)
00884         {
00885             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomNumber()) ));
00886             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomFloor()) ));
00887             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getCapacity()) ));
00888         }
00889     }
00890     if(ui->comboBox->currentIndex()==2)
00891     {
00892         Room = RM.searchByDate(ui->SearchRoomFrom->date(),ui->SearchRoomTo->date());
00893         ui->SearchRoomTableView->setRowCount(Room.size());
00894         for (unsigned int i=0;i<Room.size();i++)
00895         {
00896             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomNumber()) ));
00897             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomFloor()) ));
00898             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getCapacity()) ));
00899 
00900         }
00901     }
00902     if(ui->comboBox->currentIndex()==3)
00903     {
00904         Room = RM.fetchFreeRooms();
00905         ui->SearchRoomTableView->setRowCount(Room.size());
00906         for (unsigned int i=0;i<Room.size();i++)
00907         {
00908             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomNumber()) ));
00909             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomFloor()) ));
00910             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getCapacity()) ));
00911         }
00912     }
00913     if(ui->comboBox->currentIndex()==4)
00914     {
00915         Room = RM.fetchReservedRooms();
00916         ui->SearchRoomTableView->setRowCount(Room.size());
00917         for (unsigned int i=0;i<Room.size();i++)
00918         {
00919             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomNumber()) ));
00920             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomFloor()) ));
00921             ui->SearchRoomTableView->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getCapacity()) ));
00922         }
00923     }
00924 }
00925 
00926 void MainWindow::on_comboBox_currentIndexChanged(QString )
00927 {
00928     if(ui->comboBox->currentIndex()==0)
00929     {
00930         ui->SearchRoom->setEnabled(true);
00931         ui->SearchRoomFrom->setEnabled(false);
00932         ui->SearchRoomTo->setEnabled(false);
00933     }
00934     if(ui->comboBox->currentIndex()==1)
00935     {
00936         ui->SearchRoom->setEnabled(true);
00937         ui->SearchRoomFrom->setEnabled(false);
00938         ui->SearchRoomTo->setEnabled(false);
00939     }
00940     if(ui->comboBox->currentIndex()==2)
00941     {
00942         ui->SearchRoom->setEnabled(false);
00943         ui->SearchRoomFrom->setEnabled(true);
00944         ui->SearchRoomTo->setEnabled(true);
00945     }
00946 }
